effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavorTexts.text:
The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the
opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those
Pokémon with a burn.
